org.apache.flink.streaming.api.function.sink

Class WriteSinkFunctionByBatches<IN>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.streaming.api.function.sink.WriteSinkFunction<IN>
      • org.apache.flink.streaming.api.function.sink.WriteSinkFunctionByBatches<IN>
  • Type Parameters:
    IN - Input tuple type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Function, SinkFunction<IN>

    public class WriteSinkFunctionByBatches<IN>
extends WriteSinkFunction<IN>
    Implementation of WriteSinkFunction. Writes tuples to file in equally sized batches.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
